Name: Pentaball
About the game: Every wanted to play basketball, but instead with polygons instead of people? Prepare to play PentaBall! A high speed physics based Basketball game! With your controller you can challenge the computer to a 1v1, or play your friends in multiplayer mode! Choose your polygon, pick your team, and play in one of the newest forms of basketball! PentaBall!!!
Developers: Marco S Hampel,Matthew Reeves,Shivvan Kajaria,William Lu
